original_text: That ye may approve things that are excellent; that ye may be sincere and without offence till the day of Christ.
korean_text: 너희로 지극히 선한 것을 분별하며 또 진실하여 허물 없이 그리스도의 날까지 이르고

sentences.original_text: That ye may approve things that are excellent
sentences.korean_translation: 너희가 최상의 것들을 분별하게 하려 함이라
